eserviceDescriptionField.label: What does this e-service allow you to do?

eserviceTechnologyField.label: What technology is your API built with?

eserviceModeField.label: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?

step1.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfo: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the first version of this e-service is published

stepPurpose.firstVersionOnlyEditableInfoAlert: The contents of this step will no longer be editable after the publication of the first version of the e-service

purposeTableSection.title: Purpose
purposeTableSection.description: Indicate the use cases for which you intend to collect data. For each purpose you will need to complete a risk analysis.
purposeTableSection.noSelectedPurposesTooltip: You must indicate at least one purpose to continue

riskAnalysisNameSection.title: Purpose
riskAnalysisNameSection.description: Indicate a use case for which you intend to collect data and complete the risk analysis.

riskAnalysisSection.title: Risk analysis
riskAnalysisSection.description: The questions in the questionnaire will vary based on the answers provided gradually. If you change the answer to a previous question, subsequent questions may change.
riskAnalysisSection.personalDataAlert: Be careful not to enter personal data in the free text fields

audienceField.label: Audience
audienceField.infoLabel: Represents the recipient of the voucher, i.e. your target resource. Doubts? <1>Read the guide</1>

thresholdSection.title: Threshold of calls expected for consumers

validation.min: This value cannot be below the threshold set for the API calls/day for each subscriber

agreementApprovalPolicySection.title: Do you want to manually activate all the fruition requests received?
agreementApprovalPolicySection.label: Yes, I will activate them manually

step3.attributesDescription: Please point out all the certified, verified and declared attributes that the provider must have in order to create an agreement for the e-service
step3.attributeCloneNoAttributesLabel: There are no attribute to copy

createAttributeDrawer.subtitle: Una volta creato, troverai l’attributo nella lista tra quelli disponibili per essere aggiunti ad un e-service

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Upload the technical documents that can help implement the use of this e-service

notPublishableTooltip.label: Uno o più campi richiesti non sono stati compilati. Completa la bozza

importVersionDrawer.title: Import E-Service
importVersionDrawer.subtitle: For further doubts and information <1>go to the manual</1>
importVersionDrawer.disabledImportTooltip: You cannot import the file. You must first review and confirm the options.
importVersionDrawer.description: Before proceeding, check the following sections, then confirm and proceed.

attributeInfoSection.label: Attributes
attributeInfoSection.description: If your e-service includes attributes, you will have to insert them from scratch after uploading this zip.

eserviceTitleInfoSection.label: E-service title duplicate
eserviceTitleInfoSection.description: If there already exists an e-service provided by your institution with the same name as the one inserted in this zip, the upload will not be successful.

structureInfoSection.label: Archive structure
structureInfoSection.description: If you have added/removed/renamed files inside the zip, you have updated the configuration file accordingly.

apiInterfaceInfoSection.label: API interface
apiInterfaceInfoSection.description: Make sure you have entered the correct server URLs for delivery.

alert.suspended: This e-service version is discontinued. Until its reactivation, no consumer will be able to access the data provided through the API.
alert.deprecated: This e-service version is obsolete but still active. It will be automatically discontinued by PDND Interoperabilità when the last agreement on this version is archived.

technicalInformations.title: E-service technical specifications
technicalInformations.description: In this section you can check the specifications of the e-service and make changes.

usefulLinks.title: Useful links
usefulLinks.implementAndManageEService: How do I implement and manage an e-service?
usefulLinks.verifyVoucher: How do I verify a consumer's voucher?

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Below are all the certified, verified or declared attributes that are required for the use of the E-service.

updateThresholdsDrawer.title: Change voucher lifespan and thresholds
updateThresholdsDrawer.subtitle: From this panel you can update the parameters of your e-service version. The changes made will take effect immediately.

mode.label: Does the e-service deliver or receive data?

usefulLinks.title: Useful links
usefulLinks.integrateEService: How do I integrate an e-service?
usefulLinks.implementAndManageEService: How do I implement and manage an e-service?
usefulLinks.verifyVoucher: How do I verify a consumer's voucher?

updateDocumentationDrawer.title: Modifica documentazione
updateDocumentationDrawer.subtitle: Ora puoi modificare, scaricare ed eliminare i documenti allegati all’e-service.
updateDocumentationDrawer.interfaceInfoTooltip: Il file “Specifica API” non è modificabile. Per aggiornarlo, crea una nuova versione.

tableEServiceCatalog.eserviceSuspendedTooltip: It is currently not possible to submit new requests, the e-service is suspended
tableEServiceCatalog.missingCertifiedAttributesTooltip: Your institution does not have the certified attributes necessary to register
